Question
========

Which of the following four measures are measures of dispersion? 1: spread width, 2: mode, 3: variance, 4: median

Answerlist
----------

* 1 and 3
* 1,2 and 3
* 2 and 4
* All four

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1 and 3: Correct
* 1,2 and 3: Incorrect
* 2 and 4: Incorrect
* All four: Incorrect
